snippet: Amid disclosures of a restricted diet and recorded court conversations involving Carmelo Anthony, the Knicks flew to London to play the Detroit Pistons.
abstract: New York Knicks travel to London to face Detroit Pistons amid disclosures of restricted diet and recorded court conversations involving team's forward Carmelo Anthony.
lead_paragraph: Amid disclosures of a restricted diet and recorded court conversations involving Carmelo Anthony, the Knicks flew to London to play the Detroit Pistons.

headline.seo: Knicks Fly to London With Carmelo Anthony in the News
headline.main: Questions Linger After Knicks’ Send-Off to London
headline.print_headline: Knicks Head to London With a Full Plate of Anthony Intrigue
